bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Sarah and husband Frank Lovell were Trotskyist activists who played a significant role in the Detroit labor and socialist movements of the 1950s and 1960s. In the late 1960s, Frank and Sarah were involved in the Socialist Workers Party's trade union activity in New York City until Lovell and Sarah were expelled from the SWP in 1981.
